commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
L=[]
u=0
t,m=0
n=int(input('n='))
for i in range(1,n+1):
    L+=[int(input())]
for i in L:
    if i>0: u+=1
    if i%2==0: 
        t+=i
        m+=1
